author: Special Correspondent
text:
The JSW Steel Salem Works commissioned Rs. 2.5 lakh worth of Reverse Osmosis (RO) Plant at the Mettur Government Hospital, Mettur, on Saturday. The installation of the RO will help the about 250 inpatients and 2,000 outpatients visiting the hospital every day for treatment. The new plant was commissioned by Senthilkumar, Superintendent, Government Hospital, Mettur.

T. K. Naha, Senior Vice President (Operations), JSW Steel Salem Works, was the chief guest on the occasion. B. E. Rajendran, Associate Vice President (HR), JSW Steel, Salem Work, and Ramesh, Surgeon, were present.
title: RO plant commissioned at Mettur GH
